title: Spellforce Platinum (GOG)
description:
Install instructions:
1. Run "setup_spellforce_platinum_2.0.0.8"
2. Play
PLEASE REMEMBER TO SEED, MANY OTHERS WANT THIS GAME! :)
If you like this game, support the developers and BUY IT!

Title: SPELLFORCE PLATINUM
Genre: Role-playing - Strategy - Fantasy
Works on: Windows (XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10)
Languages: Audio and text: English
Modes: Single-player
Released: November 15, 2005
Size: 2.3 GB
Company: JoWooD Productions Software / Nordic Games
Rating:	ESRB Rating: Teen (with Blood, Fantasy Violence, Mild Language, Suggestive Themes)
Store page: https://www.gog.com/game/the_masterplan

About:
In their greed for a long forgotten power, thirteen of the most eminent mages of all time have caused the world of EO to tumble into chaos and destruction. Enter this world beyond imagination in an epic adventure spanning time and continents. Indulge yourself in a world full of magic, battles and adventure, where the courage of one may decide the destiny of many. Lead your armies through spectacular battles and experience thrilling adventures.
Multiplayer notice: The game's multiplayer servers have been taken offline and the only option available is LAN. To get your unique, multiplayer CD-key, please see this support article.
Includes the original SpellForce: The Order of Dawn and both the expansions - SpellForce: The Breath of Winter and SpellForce: Shadow of the Phoenix
A great blend of the action and tactics of an RTS with an immersive role-playing experience
Countless upgradeable spells and items to use and 6 races to command against over 100 types of enemies

Minimum system requirements - Windows: Windows XP or Windows Vista, 1.8 GHz Processor, 512MB RAM (1 GB recommended), 3D graphics card compatible with DirectX 7 (compatible with DirectX 9 recommended), 4GB HDD, Mouse, Keyboard.Compatibility notice: The landscape editor included as a bonus is NOT compatible with 64-bit systems
